title: Expand satellite map to 90% screen coverage on click

requirements.summary: Expand satellite map column to 90% width when clicked, collapsing other columns to share 10% total width
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the map column expands it to 90% screen width
Other two columns are collapsed to share 10% total width
Clicking the map again or clicking another column restores the default layout
Transition is smooth and matches existing column expansion behavior

file_operations.description: Modify the existing click-to-expand column functionality to apply 90% width to the map column when expanded (instead of the current expansion ratio). Update the column width calculation logic so that when the map column is clicked, it receives 90% width while the other two columns share the remaining 10% width (5% each). Ensure the transition animation remains smooth and consistent with the existing behavior. Preserve the ability to restore default layout by clicking the expanded column again or clicking another column.
